name: IndentGuide
body:
## Indent Guide plug-in for Eclipse

### Feature
This plug-in adds 'Indent Guide' (vertical line on indentation columns) to eclipse text editor.

### Screenshot
![example](http://atlanto.github.com/IndentGuide/imgs/example.png)

### Preferences
![preferences](http://atlanto.github.com/IndentGuide/imgs/preferences.png)

### Update Site
http://atlanto.github.com/IndentGuide/update
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
